name: HALLOWEEN GRAVEYARD
description:
It's Halloween night and the dead are coming back to life. Use the bucket near the pond to pour water over their graves and prevent them from escaping before it's too late... survive until dawn and you might live to see another day...

[Spoiler] Not intended as a Jumpscare, but just something to be aware of if you get scared easily. There is a pretty eerie sound that plays whenever the player dies as seen in roughly 0:55 of the trailer

Controls: Walk over the bucket to fill it up, use LMB to pour it out
